title: Eruption
description: Two and a half years later, Penny and James are living happily in New York City. Their love is stronger than ever. Penny is graduating from NYCU, James is growing his new business, and the two are getting married at the end of the month.But graduation, starting an internship, and planning a wedding is a lot for Penny to tackle. Especially when mysteries from James' past are clawing at the surface and his scheming ex and unsupportive parents threaten to destroy the happy couple.Will their own insecurities make them question everything and sway them from the altar?This is BOOK 3 of THE HUNTED romance series.Temptation (The Hunted Series Book 1)Addiction (The Hunted Series Book 2)City of Sin (The Hunted Series Book 2.5) - Mason and Bee's storyEruption (The Hunted Series Book 3) Third Chances (The Hunted Series Book 3.5) - Rob and Daphne's storyDevotion (The Hunted Series Book 4) Coming October 27thLibrarian's note: See alternate cover edition of ASIN B01D917CL6 here.
author: Ivy Smoak
